parameter.name: language
parameter.label: Language
parameter.description: The default language that should be used. If not specified, the system default locale is used.

parameter.name: script
parameter.label: Script
parameter.description: The script that should be used.

parameter.name: region
parameter.label: Country / Region
parameter.description: The region that should be used.

parameter.name: variant
parameter.label: Variant
parameter.description: A variation of the Locale. Any arbitrary value used to indicate a variation of a Locale.

parameter.name: timezone
parameter.label: Time Zone
parameter.description: A time zone can be set from the user interface. The underlying system's time zone is the default.

parameter.name: location
parameter.label: Location
parameter.description:
The location of this installation.
Coordinates as <latitude>,<longitude>[<altitude>]
Example: "52.5200066,13.4049540" (Berlin)

parameter.name: measurementSystem
parameter.label: Measurement System
parameter.description: The measurement system is used for unit conversion.
